definition: to flood/to submerge/to drown/to irritate the skin (of liquids)/to delay

sentences.english: Han hero killed immediately, the river water would drown people.
sentences.chinese: 马上摔死英雄汉，河中淹死会水人。

sentences.english: He jeopardized his life to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他冒着生命危险挽救那个快要淹死的孩子。

sentences.english: An unfortunate man would be drowned in a tea-cup.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的人会淹死在茶杯里。
于是他就把精卫淹死了。

sentences.english: If the child had fallen through the ice, he would have drowned.
sentences.chinese: 假如这孩子掉到冰窑里，他定会淹死了。

sentences.english: No one ever drowned in sweat.
Drowning is a terrible way to go.
Dai Dapan had been drowned by thousands of eels which held him under water until he died.
sentences.chinese: 戴大盘被几千条鳝鱼拖在水里直至淹死。

sentences.english: When Jack nearly drowned, they brought him to by artificial respiration.
sentences.chinese: 当杰克快淹死时，他们用人工呼吸使他恢复知觉。

sentences.english: And here they fish for gold and drown.
sentences.chinese: 为了钓到金子也不怕淹死。

sentences.english: People fled toward the Sumida River, drowning by the hundreds when bridges collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 人们都逃向隅田川，当桥塌陷时淹死了几百人。

sentences.english: The boy fell through the ice and was drowned.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩子掉入冰窟中淹死了。

sentences.english: The fisherman almost got drowned when his boat was overturned.
sentences.chinese: 当渔夫的船翻覆时，他几乎淹死。

sentences.english: The monkey who did not behave carefully drowned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 这只对自己举动不小心的猴子在水里淹死了。

sentences.english: Many of them drowned as they tried to cross a river.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在试图穿渡河时被淹死。

sentences.english: I came near being drowned in the attempt to swim across.
sentences.chinese: 我在试图游到对岸去时差一点被淹死。

definition: to flood/to submerge/to drown/to irritate the skin (of liquids)/to delay
lit. to be buried in the bellies of fish (idiom)/fig. to drown
to starve to death/to be very hungry
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to freeze to death/to die off in winter
to capsize/(fig.) to suffer a setback or defeat
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
